trans-unit.source: Stores linked resources to be sent as part of an email message.
trans-unit.target: Almacena recursos vinculados que se enviarán como parte de un mensaje de correo electrónico.

trans-unit.source: An instance of the <xref:System.Net.Mail.LinkedResourceCollection> class is returned by the <xref:System.Net.Mail.AlternateView.LinkedResources%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: Una instancia de la <xref:System.Net.Mail.LinkedResourceCollection> clase es devuelta por la <xref:System.Net.Mail.AlternateView.LinkedResources%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propiedad.

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the <see cref="T:System.Net.Mail.LinkedResourceCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: Libera todos los recursos que usa <see cref="T:System.Net.Mail.LinkedResourceCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: Call <xref:System.Net.Mail.LinkedResourceCollection.Dispose%2A> when you are finished using the <xref:System.Net.Mail.LinkedResourceCollection>.
trans-unit.target: Llame a <xref:System.Net.Mail.LinkedResourceCollection.Dispose%2A> cuando haya terminado de usar <xref:System.Net.Mail.LinkedResourceCollection>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Mail.LinkedResourceCollection.Dispose%2A> method leaves the <xref:System.Net.Mail.LinkedResourceCollection> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: El método <xref:System.Net.Mail.LinkedResourceCollection.Dispose%2A> deja el <xref:System.Net.Mail.LinkedResourceCollection> en un estado no utilizable.

trans-unit.source: After calling <xref:System.Net.Mail.LinkedResourceCollection.Dispose%2A>, you must release all references to the <xref:System.Net.Mail.LinkedResourceCollection> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.Net.Mail.LinkedResourceCollection> occupied.
trans-unit.target: Después de llamar a <xref:System.Net.Mail.LinkedResourceCollection.Dispose%2A>, debe liberar todas las referencias a <xref:System.Net.Mail.LinkedResourceCollection> para que el recolector de elementos no utilizados pueda reclamar la memoria que ocupaba <xref:System.Net.Mail.LinkedResourceCollection>.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obtener más información, consulte [limpiar recursos no administrados](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) y [implementa un método Dispose](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

trans-unit.source: This method invokes <xref:System.Net.Mail.AlternateView.Dispose%2A> on all views in this collection.
trans-unit.target: Este método invoca <xref:System.Net.Mail.AlternateView.Dispose%2A> en todas las vistas de esta colección.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the <xref:System.Net.Mail.MailMessage.Dispose%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Este método es invocado por el <xref:System.Net.Mail.MailMessage.Dispose%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: You do not need to call it in your application.
trans-unit.target: No es necesario que lo llame en su aplicación.

trans-unit.source: Always call <xref:System.Net.Mail.LinkedResourceCollection.Dispose%2A> before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.Net.Mail.LinkedResourceCollection>.
trans-unit.target: Realice siempre una llamada a <xref:System.Net.Mail.LinkedResourceCollection.Dispose%2A> antes de liberar la última referencia al objeto <xref:System.Net.Mail.LinkedResourceCollection>.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using are not freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.Net.Mail.LinkedResourceCollection> object's `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: De lo contrario, los recursos que esté utilizando no se liberarán hasta que el recolector de elementos no utilizados llame al método <xref:System.Net.Mail.LinkedResourceCollection> del objeto `Finalize`.
